document_data.name: Drizzt's mithral chainmail
document_data.mainbody: '''Drizzt's mithral chainmail''' was of course the suit of [[enchanted]] [[armor]] belonging to [[Drizzt Do'Urden]] in the 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Description: The armor was fashioned from [[mithral]] and had a blue tint.
document_data.Powers: The armor was a ''+4 mithral [[chainmail]]''. It was extremely lightweight without compromising its protection or hindering the wearer's skills and [[spell]]casting.
document_data.History:
[[File:drizzt armor bg.png|thumb|''Squint.'']]
The armor was crafted for Drizzt by [[Buster Bracer]] while living in [[Icewind Dale]] or by his companion [[Bruenor Battlehammer]].
